title: The Avocado Drive Zoo: At Home With My Family and the Creatures We've Loved
description: THE AVOCADO DRIVE ZOO is a warm and personal, yet humorous,recounting of how the members of the Hamner family have lived with andloved the animals in their lives. By the time they moved to Hollywoodand settled into a lovely residence on Avocado Drive, their home wasvirtually a zoo.
author: Earl Hamner Jr.
